author: Special Correspondent
text:
One person was killed and three others injured when a private bus hit against a two-wheeler and a pedestrian near Annavasal on Sunday.

Police said that Karuppiah (45), his wife Rani (40) and their son Hariharan (20) who were going by a two-wheeler from Annavasal to Kurukalaiyapatti, were hit by a private bus proceeding from Manapparai to Pudukottai. The bus hit a pedestrian Chinnathambi, before coming to a halt. The injured were rushed to the Government Headquarters Hospital where Karuppiah died of injuries. The police have registered a case and are investigating. C. Vijaya Baskar, Minister for Health, who was attending a government function at Annavasal, immediately rushed to the hospital and visited the injured.
title: One dead, three injured in accident
